EmailTemplate.name: 5 Days until Work Order Due Date
EmailTemplate.subject: 5 Days until Work Order Due Date - Please review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Phunions,
Work Order {!Order.WONameLink__c} for {!Order.WOAccountLink__c} is due in 5 business days. Please review as a team as needed to make sure all line items are on schedule and shipping information is accurate.
Thanks,
Ralph the Rooster
